name: Another_World
description:
It was an average day for Steve the intern, until he gets a strange call late at night telling him to go back to work.
When he arrives, Steve gets lost in his own paranoid delusions until tragedy strikes.
Left with no way out, Steve decides to end it all. But instead, he finds himself in..

..another world...

Another_World is a Silent Hill/P.T. inspired psychological horror game. This is my first independently developed game made with Unreal Engine 4.

Featuring an original story and music written by me.

Another_World takes much inspiration from the gameplay mechanics and atmosphere of Silent Hill, but with an addition of Sci-fi elements.
Artificial Intelligence is a reoccurring motif, blurring the lines between human and robot.
Can human thoughts be translated by an A.I.? Can our worst nightmares be constructed by an unfeeling machine?
Can the human mind ever be truly understood?

Act 2 coming Halloween 2020.
